problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD中,∠BAD=121°,∠B=∠D=90°,在BC、CD上分别找到一点M、N,使△AMN周长最小时,则∠AMN+∠ANM的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, ∠BAD = N_0, ∠B = ∠D = N_1, find a point M and N on BC and CD respectively, so that when the perimeter of △AMN is the smallest, then the degree of ∠AMN + ∠ANM is ( )
raw_answer: 解:如下图,作A关于BC和CD的对称点A′,A″,连接A′A″,交BC于M,交CD于N,则A′A″即为△AMN的周长最小值．作DA延长线AH,∵∠DAB=121°,∴∠HAA′=59°,∴∠AA′M+∠A″=∠HAA′=59°,∵∠MA′A=∠MAA′,∠NAD=∠A″,且∠MA′A+∠MAA′=∠AMN,∠NAD+∠A″=∠ANM,∴∠AMN+∠ANM=∠MA′A+∠MAA′+∠NAD+∠A″=2(∠AA′M+∠A″)=2×59°=118°．故选:A．
